Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at SANA Metropolitan Hotel places you in the heart of Lisbon, minutes from Hospital Santa Maria and close to Castle of Sao Jorge. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of University of Lisbon and Lisbon Zoo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 315 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include supervised childcare/activities, gift shops/newsstands, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Lisbon? This hotel has 19160 square feet (1780 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features at this Art Deco hotel include supervised childcare/activities, gift shops/newsstands, and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 315 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at SANA Metropolitan Hotel places you in the heart of Lisbon, minutes from Hospital Santa Maria and close to Castle of Sao Jorge. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of University of Lisbon and Lisbon Zoo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hospital Santa Maria - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
University of Lisbon - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Lisbon Zoo - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hospital Curry Cabral - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Gulbenkian Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
National Library - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Campo Pequeno Bullring - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Center for Modern Art - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Cidade Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Culturgest - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Rafael Bordalo Pinheiro Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Dolce Vita Shopping Monumental Mall - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Saldanha Square - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Maria Matos Municipal Theater - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for SANA Metropolitan Hotel is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for SANA Metropolitan Hotel is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

****NOTA***NOTE*** EN CASO DE RESERVAS NO REEMBOLSABLES EL HOTEL SE RESERVA EL DERECHO A CARGAR EL IMPORTE DE LA ESTANCIA DESDE EL MOMENTO DE LA CONFIRMACION DE LA MISMA IN CASE OF NON REFUNDABLE RESERVATIONS THE HOTEL RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE THE ENTIRE AMOUNT OF THE STAY ONCE THE RESERVATION IS CONFIRMED

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
